column1: good length, angled across, slashes on the up and gets a thick outside edge to third man
good length at off stump, goes forward and pushes into the off side
full at middle stump, punched to mid-on
yorker at off stump, digs it out and back to the bowler
back of a length and down the leg side
full at leg stump, driven to mid-on
full and angled across off stump, looks to hit it inside-out over mid-off, gets the bottom and it lands safely to his left
back of a length at middle, jumps up to push it into the leg side
good length in the corridor, driven on the up to mid-off
back of a length, starts well outside leg and is wide despite tailing out towards the hips
short and wide, stands up tall and punches it beautifully between point and cover
full outside off stump, driven off the bottom of the bat to mid-off
full and angled into the pads, offers the full face before flicking it to mid-on's right
full outside off, leans in, maintains balance, and punches it classily past mid-off who puts in a chase but can't keep it in
good length in the corridor, defended off the front foot
good length, angled across from the corridor, but he stands tall and whips it against the angle through midwicket. What a talent, this guy
good length outside off, front foot defence to point
back of a length outside off, drops it into the gully region with soft hands
good length at off stump, steps down the track and lifts it on the up, still head, over mid-on. Who needs Gayle?
good length in the corridor, pokes at it with no feet, beaten on the outside edge
full at middle, whipped gracefully to deep square leg's left
good length, tailed down the leg side, glanced off the pads to deep square
good length outside off, pushed off the front foot to third man

dropped! Yikes, that was embarrassing for Mahmudullah. Good length at off stump, tries to whip it on the up into the leg side, gets a leading edge and he runs backwards, looking right from mid-off, realizes the ball's to his left and makes a last ditch turn to try and catch, but completely misses it
good length at middle stump, flicked to deep square
short and wide, shapes up to slap it over point, but has to check his shot as the ball sits in the pitch. Goes aerial anyway and lifts it over cover
tossed up at off stump, defended back to the bowler
flighted at middle stump, steps out, stays still and unleashes the full flow of his arc to lift it over the midwicket boundary
good length at leg stump, flatter this time, steps out, isn't to the pitch and punches uppishly to deep midwicket
back of a length at off stump, goes back and punches straight to point
flat and full, fired down the leg side, gets down and paddles it easily. He has six fielders on the off side who're wondering what they're doing there
good length at leg stump, punched to midwicket
short and angled into the chest, he shapes up to hook this, cops it on the body
short and down the leg side, misses another attempted hook, but this time there's a run for it
good length, angled in at middle stump, nudged to midwicket
good length outside off, a lazy push at it that flies enticingly towards the fielders in the circle on the off side, but just about goes in the gap between point and cover. No control of that.
slower bouncer outside off, hangs back, waits for it and plays a short-arm jab to KP's right at short fine to bring up the fifty partnership
good length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
good length outside off, punched to cover
tossed up outside off from around the wicket, steps out and gets a leading edge on his drive, to long-off
good length at leg stump, shuffles across the stumps and guides it fine into the leg side
good length, arm ball at middle, pushed to covers
back of a length at middle stump, hangs back and punches it to deep midwicket
full at off stump, driven to long-on off the front foot
back of a length outside off,  whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
tosses it up nicely outside off, he stays balanced, gets on top of the bounce, waits for it to come to him and executs a glorious cover drive
good length at off stump, uses his wrists to turn it into the leg side
good length at the pads, pushed into the open leg side
back of a length on the pads, hangs back and whips it uppishly between deep square and deep midwicket
gone! Beaten in flight. Good length outside off, looks like he premeditated charging down the track. Couldn't get to the pitch, tried to hit it on the up over covers but was well beaten
tossed up at off stump, pushes off the front foot to extra cover
good length outside off, driven to long-off
good length at middle stump, tries to turn it into the leg side lazily, gets a leading edge that lands safely in front of him
full at middle stump, punched back to the bowler
good length at leg stump, gets on one knee and misses the slog sweep
good length at middle, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
low full toss at middle stump, drives it long-on's left
faster one, good length on the pads, turns it behind square on the leg side
back of  a length on the pads, glanced to deep square
good length at middle stump, goes on the back foot and pushes back to the bowler
arm ball, good length at off stump, pushed into the off side with soft hands
good length, fired into the pads, looked like it was seam-up. Flicked to midwicket where Shehzad takes two strides and dives low to his right
good length outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
back of a length in the corridor, back foot punch miscues straight to covers
steps out and makes it a full toss at middle, but can only hit it straight to deep midwicket
good length, arm ball, wide outside off and left alone
yorker length outside leg, tries to flick this and misses it, it seemed to have hit the boot clearly, but it's been called wide as it trickles fine for a four
good length at middle, catches yet another attempted slog sweep on the pads
fired full and fast down the leg side, Sarfraz has to dive
tossed up at middle, opens up to drive this but gets an inside edge onto pad
good length, pitches outside leg stump and spins further
yorker at middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
good length at off stump, steps out and drives it back to the bowler

good length, seam up, angled down the leg, gets on one knee and connects this sweep nicely but Hasan has run in and dived forward to take it inches off the ground. Superb fielding. That was flat and dipping fast
good length at middle, pushes back and tries to hit this very hard, but it's not timed well and sweeper gets across to his right
good length on middle stump, pushed off the back foot to deep midwicket
tossed up at middle, driven down to long-off
back of  a length at off stump, pulls it straight to midwicket
back of a length in the corridor, pushes at it and gets a forearm, one bounce to slip
short and wide, hangs back and slaps it over covers and well to the left of sweeper cover
back of a length at the pads, glanced to fine leg, he's liking this pace
good length at off stump, tries to flick across the line, leading edge into the off side
back of a length, angled down leg, goes for a glance, misses it, they've appealed for caught behind but that has evaded the gloves and is a wide
full outside off, leans into the cover drive that goes straight to sweeper cover

what a ball. Gayle had no idea what happened there. Back of a length outside off, slower ball, climbs onto him and hits his arms. He's through his attempted defence - a blind push - about 4 light years before it reaches him and doesn't even know where to look as it bobs up in front of him
good length at off, goes for the cut, spins back in, not enough room, inside edge onto pad
good length at middle, stands in the crease, no feet and slogs across the line, straight to deep midwicket
full at middle, crunches it past Malik at the non-strikers, but long-on puts in a nice slide to his right. Rossouw down there
good length at middle, no feet once more, but the attempted slog is fine enough to beat deep square

short at middle stump, seam up again, this isn't a great ball. Malik lights up and tries to pummel this over the leg side boundary, but it is too big, and he hasn't middled it. Goes straight to Hasan, who can stay on his feet for this one
good length at off stump, defended off the front foot to point
slower bouncer at middle, pulls it along the ground to fine leg
bouncer at middle stump, ducks under it
low full toss well outside off stump
off cutter, good length in the corridor, flies past his outside edge as he pokes at it
slower ball, back of a length outside off, waits for it and punches to long-off
bouncer at his chest, goes for an expansive pull, fine leg was in, but he gets no connection and it rolls to that fielder
yorker at middle stump, goes deep in his crease and smashes it past the bowler's head, long-off runs to his right and puts in a slide
short at middle, nails the pull shot, deep square leg has to put in a dive, but they're never going to run more than a single
he's eaten some strategy for dinner, during that break. Full at middle stump, clears the front foot and lifts it over long-on
slower bouncer at middle stump, attempted hook, hits the sticker of the bat and falls harmlessly in front of short fine
low full toss at middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket
slower bouncer, sits in the pitch, and flies past his attempted hook shot, just above his right shoulder

slower ball outside off, slogs across the line, gets a top-edge and it flies over short third man...for six? It didn't look like it, but that's the signal. Let's wait for the replays....yep, lands just inside and it will be overturned
back of a length outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
good length at off stump, throws his bat across the line, doesn't quite connect, but rolls his wrists enough to get it past deep square
short ball down the leg, the kind of ball that deserves to fly 100 metres, but he swivels, goes too hard at it and loses one hand. Forehand top-spinner down to fine-leg
bouncer at middle, opens up his arms and sways at this, but it flies over his shoulder
good length at leg stump, whips it into the leg side uppishly, they take about 4 steps each and go back. Just a single.

slower ball, good length at middle stump, he thinks this is in the slot but doesn't pick the slower ball. Through his slog early, hits the back leg and rolls through the slip cordon for short third to cut off
good length, angled in at off, walks at it as he gets a leading edge on the attempted flick, flies to third man
slower bouncer, flies past the wide marker
back of a length in the corridor, hangs back and slaps it flat to sweeper cover
back of a length, back of the hand slower ball, sits up outside off, dabbed down to third man
back of a length at the hips, glanced to short fine's right
back of a length at middle, whipped off the back foot to deep midwicket
slower short ball at middle, opens his arms and tucks it down into the leg side with a mistimed pull
short ball at middle, not enough pace, not enough height, but enough bat. Deep in the crease and slapped over deep square leg

...and gone. Holes out to deep midwicket. Wasn't a great ball - straight, good length, on the pads. Perfect for a Gayle slog, but not this Gayle. Clears the front leg and slogs it straight to the fielder
slower bouncer outside off, gets under it and uses his wrists to keep the pull down
slower bouncer outside off, goes down the track and throws an unceremonious swipe at it, misses by a long way and Sarfraz claps for his bowler

good length at off stump, backs away and bludgeons this back at the bowler who is a very smart man because he has ducked under this instead of trying to catch it. That was travelling fast. Long-off cuts it off
back of a length at leg stump, gets some bat on his pull shot but it is straight to the fielder
slower bouncer outside off, backs away, hangs on, and slaps it square through point
bouncer at middle stump, gets deep in the crease and gets a lot on this hook shot and it sails over the square leg boundary
slower ball, length ball, middle stump. Easy pickings. Backs away, deposits it between deep midwicket and long-on
full on the pads, whips it out to deep midwicket...and doesn't run
full and well wide down the leg side
low full toss at leg stump, gets under it too much, hits it high into the sky, not much distance, Anwar Ali pouches it ten yards inside the deep midwicket boundary
good length outside off, no complications, hangs in the crease, whacks it on the up, straight over the bowler and they get past 150
good length at off stump, steps down and turns it off his pads to fine leg. Wasn't to the pitch there
good length, angled into the pads, steps out and pushes on the up to long-on
short and on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
good length at leg stump, steps out, not to the pitch, inside edge into the leg side and a slight hesitation
back of a length at middle, pushed to long-on's right, they want two but he's run in quickly and relased that in no time
good length at the pads, flicked to square leg
back of a length, shaped into the thighs, catches the guard and flies past short fine leg
full outside off, no shape this time, gets the attempted cover drive on the bottom
good length on the pads, shimmies across slightly, gets it on the thigh guard again, Sanga puts a one-handed dive to his left but parries it past short fine
back of a length in the corridor, expects it to come back in, but it flies past the outside edge
good length and angled wide outside off, throws his hands at it, beaten
back of a length in the corridor, back foot defence
full outside off, leans into the cover drive, straight to short extra cover
back of a length outside off, attempted pull, top edge, flies over the slips
good length on the pads, flicked through midwicket
full and outside off, clears the front foot and drives straight to mid-off
back of a length at middle, opens the face and slices it straight to cover on the up
good length at middle, pushed tentatively to mid-off off the back foot
wide of the crease, angles this onto the pads, and he happily glances that past short fine leg
good length on the pads, clipped wide of mid-on
good length, angled in at middle, punched on the up to mid-on
back of a length outside off, got leg side of it and flayed it off the middle over covers, good shot
back of  a length at middle, shoveled on the up to mid-on
follows him as he makes room, short pitched, down the leg, pulled out to deep square
good length at middle, whips it past mid-on on the up
back of a length, angled across the corridor, pushed back towards mid-on
bouncer at middle stump, sways away and nails the hook shot, floored, but straight to the fielder in the deep
back of a length at leg stump, gets deep in the crease and pulls to deep square
misses the bouncer, back of a length at middle, it sits up nicely on this languid pitch, he pulls it off the front foot in front of square, one bounce

good length, angled across from leg stump, goes for the flick, closes the face too early but the leading edge goes over the bowler and to mid-on, send his partner back after he'd taken a couple of strides down, but the shy at the stumps misses
back of a length outside off, goes for the back foot punch, checks it last minute and pushes to extra cover
good length at middle stump, leans forward and flicks it fine, deep square leg runs to his right and puts in a dive close to the ropes

dropped! Slower bouncer, he's through the pull shot early and his eyes are off the ball, balloons up for Pollard at short extra, who takes two strides, gets low and puts down a very simple catch that he made look more complicated than it was
back of a length on the hips, glanced fine and deep square is not getting to that
full outside off, clears the front foot and clatters it between non-striker and the stumps
good length, angled in at off stump, dabbed to backward point
good length at off stump, pushes forward and drops it into the off-side
good length at off stump, hangs back and mistimes the back foot punch that rolls feebly to deep cover
tossed up at middle, driven back to the bowler
full outside off, driven to covers
tossed up outside off, steps down the track and drives it long-off
tossed up at off stump, goes for the reverse sweep, but hits it straight to short third man
good length at middle, goes right forward and opens the face to push it past cover
good length outside off, not quite to the pitch, but goes against the turn anyway. Brave shot, works for him, drags it over long-on
short and wide, hangs back, picks the spot nicely between point and short third man with his cut
drops it short outside off, he jumps back and pulls this nicely between deep midwicket and long-on
classy! Tossed up at middle, steps down the track, gets to the pitch and lifts it over long-on
tossed up outside off, waits on it and drives it to sweeper cover
good length at off stump, defended back to the bowler
full at off stump, driven to long-off
good length outside off, steps out, drives on the up to cover
good length, angled into the pads, turned away to short fine
Shehzad is tired of all the Gayle talk. Tossed up at middle, steps out, gets on top of it and lifts it over the bowler with a nice follow through
good length, arm ball at off stump, goes back and just about taps it back to the bowler as it slides in
full slower ball at off stump from around the wicket, jammed out to long-on
back of a length in the corridor, defended off the back foot to point, who has a shy, hits the stumps and concedes a run
slower bouncer, steps out and is baffled, goes through with the pull, gets a top edge, goes to Sanga's left and fine leg's right
back of a length at middle, smashes this pull shot straight to deep square
back of a length, into the pads, pushed into the leg side with soft hands and Pollard has to run in a long way from deep square on this big ground
good length, angled into the pads, and pushed into the leg side with soft hands once again

dropped short outside off, pulled to long-on's right, throws it in as they've come back for a two. Bowler takes the bails off and umpire reviews...geez, the ball wasn't in his hands as he took the bails off why did he appeal, and why did it get referred?.
full toss at middle stump, goes for the slog, inside edge onto the pad
short and wide outside off, cut straight to sweeper cover
tossed up on off, driven past the bowler's left, to bring up and impressive fifty
tossed up at off stump, gets low and sweeps it to deep square
tossed up outside off, drives it to sweeper cover to bring up the 100 stand
almost throws it away. Good length, angled in at off stump, walks right across the stumps to ramp it, but it misses the stumps
full slower ball outside off, steps out, yorks himself and jams it out towards sweeper
slower short one down the leg, gets a glove on his attempted pull and it drops in the pitch area
back of a length, angled in at middle, goes back and pushes it to long-on
short and wide, chopped to third man
good length at off stump, slices it off the front foot, Imad Wasim puts in a dive and has a shy at the stumps, would've been gone with a direct hit
back of a length at middle, backs away and goes for the pull, top-edges and Pollard calls loudly as he gets under this at deep square leg and pouches it
attempted bouncer, goes for the hook, top edge, six over short fine leg and that is Shafiq's fifty, reported correctly this time
superb back-of-the-hand slower ball outside off, steps down the track and misses it wide outside off

oh, superb throw! Another back-of-the-hand slower ball, chopped straight to point, KP has taken off. There wasn't a run there. He's sent back, but there was no point in even trying. Stood and hoped for the best, but Imad Wasim was perfect there. Clean pick up, throw full of intent, and knocks the stumps over
bouncer at middle stump, goes for the hooks, flies over his head and sees the bowler in his face as he recovers
it's three in the over! Short at middle stump, backs himself on the hook shot once again, middles it, it's aerial and straight to deep square! What's happening here?
back of a length in the corridor, tries to run it down to third man, beaten on the outside edge
back of a length outside off, shapes nicely, hits the ball on the head and places the pull shot regally through midwicket
back of a length at off stump, pushed into the covers, slight hesitation, Bopara is thinking of the throw before he catches it and lets them free with that fumble
back of a length at off stump, punched straight to covers
back of a length outside off, turned towards backward point
good length outside off, driven on the up to sweeper
back-of-the-hand slower ball, pitches on the wide marker and turns away like a leg break
back of a length on the hips, glanced down to fine leg
back of a length outside off, pulls across the line, wide of long-on
slower ball, pull at the pads, pushed to deep midwicket
good length, slower ball, cuts inside from outside off, tries to chop to third man, inside edge onto the pad
short and wide, gets on his toes as it climbs on him and lifts it over point
back of a length at off, steps out, makes room and spanks it well in front of square
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-off
good length outside off, turns back sharply as he attempts a late cut and misses and misses off stump by a centimeter
dropped short at off, pulls it to midwicket
good length at middle stump, presses forward and turns it to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, gets low and converts it into a full toss to drag it to deep square
tossed up at middle stump, driven to long-off
good length at leg stump, backs away and punches it to cover
fired down the leg side, lets it go
good length outside off, slapped to covers
good length at middle stump, goes for the drive, not to the pitch, outside edge rolls away through the empty first slip region
good length on the pads, pushed to deep square
good length off, pokes at it, beaten. Good offspinner's ball
full outside off, enough of the poking he says, goes for the reverse sweep, but misses that too
dropped short at off stump, cut straight to point
good length at off, looped nicely, goes for the inside-out shot over cover but isn't to the pitch and gets a thick outside edge that falls just short of short third man
googly, good length outside off, yet another poke, beaten yet again

googly at leg stump, he feels the pressure, steps out, not to the pitch as he throws an ugly swipe at it. Top edge flies between Sanga and short fine. Sanga calls for it and puts out the gloves away from his body after running a couple of yards backwards
flighted, good length at middle, goes forward and whips across the turn to long-on
good length outside off, goes for the reverse sweep first ball and gets it past slip
slowre bouncer at middle stump, through the shot early and it hits him plush on the helmet as he closes his eyes on this. He runs through and is fine
back of a length, angled across off stump, steps out and tries to pummel this on the up over cover, thick outside edge to third man
good length outside off from around, driven to mid-off's left
full on the pads, flicked out to deep square leg
back of a length outside off, under-edges his late cut, straight to point
bouncer at middle stump, cramps him up, he let's it go...but he's overstepped. Free hit
short and wide outside off, lifts it neatly over point with his cut and keeps his team rooted to the top position and assuredly into the play-offs
